title: 05/04/21 DPS Hour 3 Chris Mannix and Damian Lillard
itunes:title: 05/04/21 DPS Hour 3 Chris Mannix and Damian Lillard
description:
Chris Mannix agrees that the Lakers are in trouble. Chris says that the Lakers won't fear any team in a play-in game. Damian Lillard says they gave Carmelo Anthony a game ball for his scoring accomplishment.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
